sentences.english: Resume breakpoint to support the proposal to use the software to download.

sentences.english: Large scaled geosciences software systems often use several dozens of types of data.
sentences.chinese: 大型的地質行業軟件系統使用到多達幾十種數據類型。

sentences.english: "The software company did not charge us too much, " says Feng.
sentences.chinese: “那家軟件公司也沒跟我們要很多錢，”馮說。

sentences.english: The iPATH Telemedicine Platform is an open-source software.

sentences.english: The anti-virus software of this computer was pre-installed.

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種智能儀表交互界面的軟件開發自動化技術。

sentences.english: A software company might give bonuses to programmers who create the fewest bugs .
sentences.chinese: 一個軟件公司可以加發獎勵給寫出最少臭蟲的程序員。

sentences.english: And, yes, you should create lightweight models of your proposed software designs.
sentences.chinese: 並且，你應該創建軟件設計的輕量級模型。

sentences.english: Extendibility is the ease of adapting software products to changes of specification.
sentences.chinese: 擴充性是指易於修改軟件以適應規格變化。

sentences.english: What do we expect from the people who develop our software?
sentences.chinese: 我們對爲我們開發軟件的人都有着什麼樣的期望呢？

sentences.english: Achieved by the stock version of the software applications on the Internet.

sentences.english: The expression is validated in Synopsys device simulation tools MEDICI.
sentences.chinese: 表達式用MEDICI器件模擬軟件進行了驗證。

sentences.english: Its authors had detailed knowledge of Siemens’ software and its security weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 筆者已經詳細的瞭解了西門子軟件的安全漏洞在哪裏。

sentences.english: Mr. Gong on Zhongguancun domestically produced software press conference.

sentences.english: This information, most likely, originates in multiple software applications.
